description:
'''New rave''' (also known as '''n√º rave''', '''nu rave''' or '''neu rave''') is a [[microgenre]] of [[electronic music]], commonly applied to a [[United Kingdom|British]]-based music scene between 2005 and late 2008. Characterized by fast-paced [[electronica]]-influenced [[Indie rock|indie music]] that drew influences from 1980s [[Madchester]] and [[rave]] scenes. New rave later influenced the development of [[blog]]-related music genres such as [[bloghouse]] and [[blog rock]]. 

Notable acts include [[Klaxons]], [[Trash Fashion]], [[New Young Pony Club]], [[Hadouken! (band)|Hadouken!]], [[Late of the Pier]] and [[Shitdisco]].
